Icons

This is the definitive list of all supported icons.

There are 3 sizes displayed for each icon:

  • @ts-fontsize-small (11px): This size is used when an icon is attached to a form field,
  • @ts-fontsize-icon (22px): This size is used most of the time when displaying icons,
  • 36px: This size isn't used directly on the pages, but it's common to use icons on this size in the App Store icons of Apps.
